1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Common properties of judgements and relations.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Judge.JudgeClass
7  ( JudgeClass,
8    GetClass (..),
9    GetTerms (..),
10    GetTermNames (..),
11    getTermNamesUnique,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base       as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax     as S
16
17-- | Name of judgement class, in other words, name of propositional function.
18type JudgeClass = String
19
20-- | Get judge class.
21class GetClass a where
22    getClass :: a -> JudgeClass
23
24-- | Get term list.
25class GetTerms a where
26    getTerms :: a c -> [S.Term c]
27
28-- | Get list of term names.
29class GetTermNames a where
30    getTermNames :: a -> [S.TermName]
31
32instance GetTermNames [S.TermName] where
33    getTermNames = id
34
35instance GetTermNames String where
36    getTermNames = S.stringTermNames
37
38-- | Get unique list of term names.
39getTermNamesUnique :: (GetTermNames a) => a -> [S.TermName]
40getTermNamesUnique = B.unique . getTermNames
